pr_title: KAFKA-9651: Fix ArithmeticException (÷ by 0) in Partitioner impls

timeline.message:
KAFKA-9651: Fix ArithmeticException (÷ by 0) in Partitioner impls

This PR fixes KAKFA-9651 by using the number of partitions from the
StreamsMetadataState, rather then from the Cluster.

KAFKA-9651: Fix ArithmeticException (÷ by 0) in Partitioner impls

This PR fixes KAKFA-9651 by using the number of partitions from the
StreamsMetadataState, rather then from the Cluster.

timeline.bodyText: minor: we can just calculate the numPartitions in this overload, and then in the other which has numPartitions passed in always blindly use that one.
timeline.author: guozhangwang
